mapper.sql: id, coupon_id, user_id, total_quantity, quantity, status, code, store_id, admin_id, updated, created
mapper.select: select a.id as num, a.coupon_id, a.user_id, a.quantity, a.code, a.created, b.title, b.summary, b.logo, b.store_ids, b.date, b.start_time from el_user_coupon a left join electronic_coupons b on a.coupon_id = b.id where a.status = 1 and b.status = 1 and b.type = 1 and a.user_id = #{userId} order by a.created DESC

select a.id as num, a.coupon_id, a.user_id, a.quantity, a.code, a.created, b.title, b.summary, b.logo, b.store_ids, b.date, b.start_time from el_user_coupon a left join electronic_coupons b on a.coupon_id = b.id where a.status = 1 and b.status = 1 and b.type = 1 and a.id = #{num}
mapper.insert: insert into el_user_coupon (id, coupon_id, user_id, total_quantity, quantity, status, code, store_id, admin_id, updated, created) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), now())

insert into el_user_coupon
id,
coupon_id,
user_id,
total_quantity,
quantity,
status,
code,
store_id,
admin_id,
updated,
created,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{totalQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update el_user_coupon
coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_quantity = #{totalQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update el_user_coupon set coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_quantity = #{totalQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
